verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came בִשְׁמוֹנִ֣ים <S%H8084><s%> vish-mo-Nim and eightieth שָׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah year וְאַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-Ba' And it came to pass in the four מֵא֣וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred שָׁנָ֡ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah year לְצֵ֣את <S%H3318><s%> le-Tzet were come out בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- after the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מֵאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> me-'e-retz- of the land מִצְרַיִם֩ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-ra-Yim of Egypt בַּשָּׁנָ֨ה <S%H8141><s%> bash-sha-Nah year הָרְבִיעִ֜ית <S%H7243><s%> ha-re-vi-'It in the fourth בְּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> be-Cho-desh in the month זִ֗ו <S%H2099><s%> Ziv, Zif ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu which הַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> ha-Cho-desh month הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni, which [is] the second לִמְלֹ֥ךְ <S%H4427><s%> lim-Loch reign שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh of Solomon's עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; over Israel וַיִּ֥בֶן <S%H1129><s%> vai-Yi-ven that he began to build הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit the house לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְהַבַּ֗יִת <S%H1004><s%> ve-hab-Ba-yit, And the house אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בָּנָ֜ה <S%H1129><s%> ba-Nah built הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech which king שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh Solomon לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, for the LORD שִׁשִּֽׁים־ <S%H8346><s%> shish-shim- thereof [was] threescore אַמָּ֥ה <S%H520><s%> 'am-Mah cubits אָרְכּ֖וֹ <S%H753><s%> a-re-Ko the length וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim thereof twenty רָחְבּ֑וֹ <S%H7341><s%> ra-che-Bo; and the breadth וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> u-she-lo-Shim thereof thirty אַמָּ֖ה <S%H520><s%> 'am-Mah cubits קוֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6967><s%> ko-ma-To. [cubits] and the height

וְהָאוּלָ֗ם <S%H197><s%> ve-ha-'u-Lam, And the porch עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- along פְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei before הֵיכַ֣ל <S%H1964><s%> hei-Chal the temple הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit, of the house עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty אַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> 'am-Mah cubits אָרְכּ֔וֹ <S%H753><s%> a-re-Ko, [was] the length עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- along פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei the front רֹ֣חַב <S%H7341><s%> Ro-chav thereof according to the breadth הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit; of the house עֶ֧שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> 'E-ser [and] ten בָּאַמָּ֛ה <S%H520><s%> ba-'am-Mah cubits רָחְבּ֖וֹ <S%H7341><s%> ra-che-Bo [was] the breadth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- along פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei the front הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit. thereof before the house

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as he made לַבָּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> lab-Ba-yit, And for the house חַלּוֹנֵ֖י <S%H2474><s%> chal-lo-Nei windows שְׁקֻפִ֥ים <S%H8261><s%> she-ku-Fim lights אֲטֻמִֽים׃ <S%H331><s%> 'a-tu-Mim. of narrow

וַיִּבֶן֩ <S%H1129><s%> vai-yi-Ven he built עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- Against קִ֨יר <S%H7023><s%> kir And against the wall הַבַּ֤יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit of the house; יָצֹועַ ya-tzo-a' כיָצִ֙יעַ֙ <S%H3326><s%> ya-Tzi-a' bed קסָבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv, round about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קִיר֤וֹת <S%H7023><s%> ki-Rot [against] the walls הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit of the house סָבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv, round about לַֽהֵיכָ֖ל <S%H1964><s%> la-hei-Chal [both] of the temple וְלַדְּבִ֑יר <S%H1687><s%> ve-lad-de-Vir; and of the oracle וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as and he made צְלָע֖וֹת <S%H6763><s%> tze-la-'ot chambers סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv. round about

הַיָּצֹועַ hai-ya-tzo-a' כהַיָּצִ֨יעַ <S%H3326><s%> hai-ya-Tzi-a' bed קהַתַּחְתֹּנָ֜ה <S%H8481><s%> hat-tach-to-Nah The nethermost חָמֵ֧שׁ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh [was] five בָּאַמָּ֣ה <S%H520><s%> ba-'am-Mah cubits רָחְבָּ֗הּ <S%H7341><s%> ra-che-Bah, broad וְהַתִּֽיכֹנָה֙ <S%H8484><s%> ve-hat-ti-cho-Nah and the middle שֵׁ֤שׁ <S%H8337><s%> shesh [was] six בָּֽאַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> ba-'am-Mah cubits רָחְבָּ֔הּ <S%H7341><s%> ra-che-Bah, broad וְהַ֨שְּׁלִישִׁ֔ית <S%H7992><s%> ve-Hash-she-li-Shit, and the third שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> She-va' [was] seven בָּאַמָּ֖ה <S%H520><s%> ba-'am-Mah cubits רָחְבָּ֑הּ <S%H7341><s%> ra-che-Bah; broad כִּ֡י <S%H3588><s%> ki for מִגְרָעוֹת֩ <S%H4052><s%> mig-ra-'Ot narrowed rests נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan he made לַבַּ֤יִת <S%H1004><s%> lab-Ba-yit the house סָבִיב֙ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv round about ח֔וּצָה <S%H2351><s%> Chu-tzah, for without [in the wall] of לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti because אֲחֹ֥ז <S%H270><s%> 'a-Choz that [the beams] should not be fastened בְּקִֽירוֹת־ <S%H7023><s%> be-ki-rot- in the walls הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit. of the house

וְהַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> ve-hab-Ba-yit And the house בְּהִבָּ֣נֹת֔וֹ <S%H1129><s%> be-hib-Ba-no-To, when it was in building אֶֽבֶן־ <S%H68><s%> 'e-ven- of stone שְׁלֵמָ֥ה <S%H8003><s%> she-le-Mah made ready מַסָּ֖ע <S%H4551><s%> mas-Sa' before it was brought נִבְנָ֑ה <S%H1129><s%> niv-Nah; was built וּמַקָּב֤וֹת <S%H4717><s%> u-mak-ka-Vot thither so that there was neither hammer וְהַגַּרְזֶן֙ <S%H1631><s%> ve-hag-gar-Zen nor axe כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- any כְּלִ֣י <S%H3627><s%> ke-Li [nor] any tool בַרְזֶ֔ל <S%H1270><s%> var-Zel, of iron לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- neither נִשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> nish-Ma' heard בַּבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> bab-Ba-yit in the house בְּהִבָּנֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1129><s%> be-hib-ba-no-To. while it was in building

פֶּ֗תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach, The door הַצֵּלָע֙ <S%H6763><s%> hatz-tze-La' chamber הַתִּ֣יכֹנָ֔ה <S%H8484><s%> hat-Ti-cho-Nah, for the middle אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about כֶּ֥תֶף <S%H3802><s%> Ke-tef side הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit of the house הַיְמָנִ֑ית <S%H3233><s%> hay-ma-Nit; [was] in the right וּבְלוּלִּ֗ים <S%H3883><s%> u-ve-lul-Lim, with winding stairs יַֽעֲלוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Lu and they went up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto הַתִּ֣יכֹנָ֔ה <S%H8484><s%> hat-Ti-cho-Nah, into the middle וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- at הַתִּֽיכֹנָ֖ה <S%H8484><s%> hat-ti-cho-Nah [chamber] and out of the middle אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַשְּׁלִשִֽׁים׃ <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shim. into the third

וַיִּ֥בֶן <S%H1129><s%> vai-Yi-ven So he built אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit the house וַיְכַלֵּ֑הוּ <S%H3615><s%> vay-chal-Le-hu; and finished וַיִּסְפֹּ֤ן <S%H5603><s%> vai-yis-Pon it and covered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit the house גֵּבִ֔ים <S%H1356><s%> ge-Vim, with beams וּשְׂדֵרֹ֖ת <S%H7713><s%> u-se-de-Rot and boards בָּאֲרָזִֽים׃ <S%H729><s%> ba-'a-ra-Zim. made of cedar

וַיִּ֤בֶן <S%H1129><s%> vai-Yi-ven And [then] he built אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- ; הַיָּצֹועַ hai-ya-tzo-a' כהַיָּצִ֙יעַ֙ <S%H3326><s%> hai-ya-Tzi-a' bed קעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- the whole הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit, against all the house חָמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh five אַמּ֖וֹת <S%H520><s%> am-Mot cubits קֽוֹמָת֑וֹ <S%H6967><s%> ko-ma-To; high וַיֶּאֱחֹ֥ז <S%H270><s%> vai-ye-'e-Choz and they rested אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit on the house בַּעֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> ba-'a-Tzei [with] timber אֲרָזִֽים׃ <S%H730><s%> 'a-ra-Zim. of cedar פ Peh

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- And the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh came to Solomon לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

הַבַּ֨יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit [Concerning] this house הַזֶּ֜ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you בֹנֶ֗ה <S%H1129><s%> vo-Neh, which thou art in building אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if תֵּלֵ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> te-Lech will walk בְּחֻקֹּתַי֙ <S%H2708><s%> be-chuk-ko-Tai in my statutes וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מִשְׁפָּטַ֣י <S%H4941><s%> mish-pa-Tai my judgments תַּֽעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh, and execute וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֥ <S%H8104><s%> ve-sha-mar-Ta and keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all מִצְוֹתַ֖י <S%H4687><s%> mitz-vo-Tai all my commandments לָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> la-Le-chet walking בָּהֶ֑ם ba-Hem; וַהֲקִמֹתִ֤י <S%H6965><s%> va-ha-ki-mo-Ti in them then will I perform אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דְּבָרִי֙ <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Ri my word אִתָּ֔ךְ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tach, for אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ti with thee which I spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to דָּוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid unto David אָבִֽיךָ׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha. thy father

וְשָׁ֣כַנְתִּ֔י <S%H7931><s%> ve-Sha-chan-Ti, And I will dwell בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch among בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and will not אֶעֱזֹ֖ב <S%H5800><s%> e-'e-Zo and will not forsake אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. Israel ס sa-Mek

וַיִּ֧בֶן <S%H1129><s%> vai-Yi-ven built שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh So Solomon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit the house וַיְכַלֵּֽהוּ׃ <S%H3615><s%> vay-chal-Le-hu. and finished

וַיִּבֶן֩ <S%H1129><s%> vai-yi-Ven And he built אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קִיר֨וֹת <S%H7023><s%> ki-Rot the walls הַבַּ֤יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit of the house מִבַּ֙יְתָה֙ <S%H1004><s%> mib-Bay-tah within בְּצַלְע֣וֹת <S%H6763><s%> be-tzal-'ot with boards אֲרָזִ֔ים <S%H730><s%> 'a-ra-Zim, of cedar מִקַּרְקַ֤ע <S%H7172><s%> mik-kar-Ka' both the floor הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit of the house עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against קִיר֣וֹת <S%H7023><s%> ki-Rot and the walls הַסִּפֻּ֔ן <S%H5604><s%> has-sip-Pun, of the cieling צִפָּ֥ה <S%H6823><s%> tzip-Pah [and] he covered עֵ֖ץ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz with wood מִבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> mib-Ba-yit; [them] on the inside וַיְצַ֛ף <S%H6823><s%> vay-Tzaf and covered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קַרְקַ֥ע <S%H7172><s%> kar-Ka' the floor הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit of the house בְּצַלְע֥וֹת <S%H6763><s%> be-tzal-'ot with planks בְּרוֹשִֽׁים׃ <S%H1265><s%> be-ro-Shim. of fir
